document.full_text: an operation to hunt down and kill osama bin laden was run jointly by pakistan and the united states, pakistani sources said on monday, belying perceptions of a rift in relations between the two countries' spy agencies.
document.title: bin laden killing was "joint u.s.-pakistani operation"
lines_and_colors: an operation to hunt down and kill osama bin laden was run jointly by pakistan and the united states, pakistani sources said on monday, belying perceptions of a rift in relations between the two countries' spy agencies.
